properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , USER_LEVEL , ENROLL_DATE , BALANCE , BLACKLIST , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SUBSTR(USER_ID,1,LENGTH(USER_ID)-3)||LPAD('*',3,'*') "USER_ID" FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
